original: Micchattaniyataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
Micchattaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
